channel.title: [Delta]Used my dclaws spec and got this error...I think its the animation

item.title: [Delta]Used my dclaws spec and got this error...I think its the animation
item.dc:creator: @MrFun MrFun
item.description:
@MrFun wrote:

Exception in thread "Thread-7" java.lang.ArrayIndexOut OfBpimdsExce[topm: 6000 at client.method101(client.java:7822) at cliend.method96(client.java:7555) at client.method114(client.java:8961) at client.method62(client.java:3057) at client.method7(client.java:2024 at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:116) at client.run(client.java:4591) at java.langThread.run(Unknown Source)

I was fixing my dclaws special on players and when I put the animation on the player i was attacking logout and the client I was using the spec with froze with this errorâ€¦What do I need to do to fix it

Here is my specials for the dclaws

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 49){ specialAmount -= 50; hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit) + misc.random(20) + misc.random(StrPrayer) + misc.random(voidmelee); startAnimation(6000); specOn = false; lastSpecial = System.currentTimeMillis(); DCdown = 3; } if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 49){ specialAmount -= 50; hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit) + misc.random(20) + misc.random(StrPrayer) + misc.random(voidmelee); startAnimation(6000); specOn = false; lastSpecial = System.currentTimeMillis(); DCdown = 3; } if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 24){ specialAtkNPC(true, 50, 282, 2068); DCdown = 4; DCDamg = true; npcDamage(8); }

Read full topic
